nodes.text: The Contruum Shipyard was a shipyard in orbit around the planet of Contruum.

A mid-sized yard consisting of a collection of interconnected spherical modules and multiple docks, it was nonetheless able to produce craft up to destroyer in size, and was considered a modest franchise.
During the Galactic Civil War, the shipyard was controlled by the Galactic Empire. Airen Cracken and Hylo Sortuli stole the Nebulon-B escort frigate Eccentric Lad there during the Contruum rebellion.
The Contruum Shipyard later produced Galactic Alliance fleet designs, including sleek destroyers with names that embodied virtues like Temperance, Prudence, and Equity.
